data_subject_rights.description: You have the right to request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
You have the right to request correction of inaccurate personal data.
You have the right to request deletion of your personal data in certain circumstances.
You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data.
You have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used format.
You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances.
You have rights in relation to automated decision-making and profiling.
